title: Metadata Service
description: This schema defines the Metadata Service entity, such as Amundsen, Atlas etc.

metadataServiceType.description: Type of database service such as Amundsen, Atlas...

id.description: Unique identifier of this database service instance.

name.description: Name that identifies this database service.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this database service.

serviceType.description: Type of database service such as MySQL, BigQuery, Snowflake, Redshift, Postgres...

description.description: Description of a database service instance.

pipelines.description: References to pipelines deployed for this database service to extract metadata, usage, lineage etc..

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this database service.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.
